item.title: The U.S. bull market is intact — and a key signal is coming from Tel Aviv, says this strategist
item.description: Tel Aviv stock market at record highs suggests investors are looking through the current crisis

item.title: ‘He doesn’t seem to care’: My secretive father, 81, added my name to a bank account. What about my mom?
item.description: “Neither my mom nor I know anything about their finances.”

item.title: Four things to know ahead of the U.S. stock-market open on Monday
item.description: Here are four key things investors should know to start the trading day.

item.title: How can I buy my niece a home in her name only — without alienating or upsetting her husband?
item.description: “They live in her husband’s home that he purchased prior to their marriage.”

item.title: My sister and her husband died within days of each other. Their banks won’t let me access their safe-deposit boxes. What now?
item.description: “The bank suggested filing a claim for unclaimed property in the state where I reside.”
